title: WHY BUSINESS OWNERS STRUGGLE
subtitle: The data shows these are the top 3 obstacles to social media success

painPoints.title: 1 - Time Drain
painPoints.description: Spending 20+ hours a week creating content that gets 100 views

painPoints.title: 2 - No Strategy
painPoints.description: Posting randomly with no plan, hoping something sticks

painPoints.title: 3 - Steep Learning Curve
painPoints.description: Trying to figure out editing, trends, and algorithms while running your business
